title: Sensei Wa Warui Ko
description:
Description :
        From Chibi Manga: The kind homeroom teacher, yoshino sensei, is actually has a black heart! sensei is quietly meddling in here and there of suzuki's school life who accidentally find about his secret. tsundere high school girl x wicked teacher, secret lovey dovey school life!

chapters.chapter_name: Vol.1 Chapter 1 : Xx At The Cutural Festival?!
